titles.title: ThinkDIFFERENTLY Nutrition and Opportunities Act of 2024
ThinkDIFFERENTLY Nutrition and Opportunities Act of 2024
To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to modify household income to exclude income earned by a member who is 21 years of age or younger and who is an elementary or secondary school student.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Foreign Agriculture, and Horticulture.
